location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 113 to John Griffith, Resident and Samuel Manesty, Factor at Bussora [Basra], from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter states that the Meer Ally Khan, Calantar [ Kalantaror Mayor] of Genowa [Bandar-e Ganaveh] had been in Bushire and claimed that he had done everything in his power to recover the packets and property stolen when a Bussora vessel was wrecked near Bunderick [Bandar-e Rig]. The letter also notes the departure (to India) of the Intrepid.
